CustomVariables.CustomVariablesReportDocumentation: This report contains information about your Custom Variables. Click on a variable name to see the distribution of the values. %s For more information about Custom Variables in general, read the %sCustom Variables documentation on piwik.org%s
CustomVariables.PluginDescription: Custom Variables are name,value pairs that you can set to a Visit using the Javascript API setVisitCustomVariables() function. Piwik will then report how many visits, pages, conversions for each of these custom names and values.
